title: Build a landing page for AI SaaS
description: Need a clean, responsive UI for our AI SaaS platform. The landing page should include hero section, features, pricing, and testimonials. Must be mobile-responsive and SEO optimized.

title: Design modern mobile app UI/UX
description: Looking for a talented designer to create modern, user-friendly mobile app interfaces. Need wireframes, mockups, and interactive prototypes for a fitness tracking app.

title: Write technical blog posts about AI
description: Need 3 well-researched blog posts about artificial intelligence trends, machine learning applications, and tech industry insights. Each post should be 1000+ words with proper SEO optimization.

title: Develop React Native mobile app
description: Build a cross-platform mobile app using React Native. The app should include user authentication, real-time chat, push notifications, and integration with REST APIs.

title: Create brand identity and logo
description: Design a complete brand identity for a new fintech startup. Need logo variations, color palette, typography guidelines, and brand style guide documentation.

title: Build e-commerce website with Next.js
description: Develop a full-featured e-commerce website using Next.js, Stripe integration, product catalog, shopping cart, user accounts, and admin dashboard.

title: Create explainer video animation
description: Produce a 2-minute animated explainer video for our software product. Need script writing, storyboard, animation, voiceover, and background music.

title: Social media marketing strategy
description: Develop comprehensive social media marketing strategy for B2B SaaS company. Include content calendar, engagement tactics, and growth strategies for LinkedIn and Twitter.

title: Data analysis and visualization
description: Analyze customer data and create interactive dashboards using Python, Pandas, and Plotly. Need insights on user behavior patterns and business recommendations.

title: Implement AI chatbot integration
description: Integrate advanced AI chatbot into existing website. Should handle customer support queries, booking appointments, and provide intelligent responses using natural language processing.
